conclusion: To determine the acceleration of the particle during the time interval from 1 to 3 seconds, we need to analyze the velocity-time (v-t) graph given in the image.
The time interval of interest is from t = 1 second to t = 3 seconds.
At t = 1 second, the velocity v1 = 2 m/s.
At t = 3 seconds, the velocity v2 = -2 m/s.
Δv = v2 - v1 = -2 m/s - 2 m/s = -4 m/s
Δt = t2 - t1 = 3 s - 1 s = 2 s
a = Δv / Δt = -4 m/s / 2 s = -2 m/s²
